testcase.name: Concession loaded successfully
testcase.system-out: Given I open a browser and after I max window I navigate to SF homepage.....passed When I enter my credentials and login to the page...........................passed Then I click on the Gear icon and open the setup page.......................passed And I click on the Search and search for Diana Turney.......................passed And I click on the login button on setup user page for Diana Turney.........passed And I search for Billing Account# 188051....................................passed And I choose Concession from Dropdwn-List...................................passed And I remove the concession for David Wrenn from Billing account............passed And I add a new concession in billing account for David Wrenn...............passed And I config the options in Concession Management page......................passed And I click on Yes to add the concession....................................passed And I verify that the phrase Successfuly Added present and take a full screenshot.passed And I click on the Finish Button............................................passed And I take a full screenshot and close the browser..........................passed
